name: Rand Secure Archive
tag_list: data-archiving, data-management, data, compliance, security, governance, email-archiving, storage-management, corporate-governance, ediscover, legal, data-backup, data-redundancy, business-continuity, disaster-recovery
overview:
Rand Secure Archive, a division of Rand Worldwide (OTCBB:RWWI), was founded in 2010 to provide high-performance data archiving and management solutions to companies of all sizes. Rand Worldwide has been providing enterprise archive solutions (EAS) for more than 10 years, dating back to its original partnership with Zantaz EAS (now a part of HP Autonomy).

In 2010, Rand Secure Archive was formed to meet the growing demand for data archiving and management solutions. Rand Secure Archive partnered with HP Autonomy to offer its industry leading IDOL platform for enterprise data archiving and management solutions at an affordable cost to organizations of all sizes.

Rand Secure Archive solutions include:

*Email Archiving

*Data Archiving

*Storage Management

*Compliance

*Corporate Governance

*Legal eDiscovery

*Data Backup & Redundancy

*Continuity & Disaster Recovery
